title: What makes this match even more memorable and great is Peter Drury's poetic commentary. He's just simply great ❤️

author: shadman531
text: Trolls will always figure out some ways to pull you down, so I'm just not going to waste my precious fucks on you. ✌️

author: Miguelomaniac
text: Can't take a joke even when winning? Go celebrate and be happy dude.
